How many people are affected by familial pityriasis rubra pilaris ?,"Familial pityriasis rubra pilaris is a rare condition. Its incidence is unknown, although the familial form appears to be the least common type of pityriasis rubra pilaris.",GHR,familial pityriasis rubra pilaris
